attributes.action: enforce Power Supply companies to lower their fuel charges to more affordable and sensible levels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My current supplier (E.on) has just increased my combined fuel bill by a massive 60% whilst the cost of gas and oil are reducing. 
When the cost of oil and gas increased they increased our bills by large amounts, and on more than one occasion - now the price of oil and gas are coming down where are the price cuts? These companies make billions in profits every year and it is ridiculous for them to make price increases during a recession when the base cost is actually reducing.

rejection.details:
